organisation-page.title: Organisation
organisation-page.description: View and edit users, locations and company information.

modal-toggle-user.title: Change user status
modal-toggle-user.description1: This action is not permanent. If you activate a user, they will be able to log in to
modal-toggle-user.description2: again. If you deactivate a user, they will be logged out and will not be able to log in again until reactivated.

modal-reset-userpw.title: Reset user password
modal-reset-userpw.description: This action sends a mail to the user, with a link to reset their password.

modal-edit-location.title: Update location
modal-edit-location.description: Here you can edit a location's name and access-level for your users.
modal-edit-location.create-more-users: Create more users to assign access rights when editing locations.
modal-edit-location.own-user: You cannot edit your own users location accesses, hence why its not shown here.

modal-toggle-location.title: Change location status
modal-toggle-location.description: This action is not permanent. If you activate a location, it can be accessed again. If you deactivate a location, it can no longer be accessed until it is reactivated.

location-page.title: Locations
location-page.location-limit-reached: You've reached the maximum number of locations for your plan.
location-page.location-upgrade-plan: Upgrade your plan to add more locations.

user-page.title: Users
user-page.user-limit-reached: You have reached the maximum number of users for your plan.
user-page.user-upgrade-plan: Upgrade your plan to add more users.

table-users-actions.same-user-tooltip: You cannot edit your own user, go to profile instead
table-users-actions.no-permission-tooltip: You do not have permission to edit this user

company-page.title: Company
company-page.description_details: View and update your company details.
company-page.description_settings: View and update your company settings.

form-company-edit.company-description: Company name is used in email communication
form-company-edit.email-description: Email is used for communication between you and Skancode, such as service notifications

settings.reference-description: Account/Case is recorded during incoming, outgoing, adjustment, and move
settings.placement-description: Placements are recorded during incoming, outgoing, adjustment, and move
settings.batch-description: Batch No. is recorded during incoming, outgoing, adjustment, and move
settings.app-signout-description: Set how long the app can stay in the background before the user is signed out
settings.app-signout-hint: The user is automatically signed out in two ways: when the screen goes to sleep, or when the app has been in the background for a certain period of time.
settings.app-signout-faq-question: When are my users signed out of the app?

modal-invite-user.title: Invite new user
modal-invite-user.description: Send an activation email to one of your employees to quickly get them started using
modal-invite-user.email-placeholder: Write email for the new user
modal-invite-user.role-question: What can the roles do? Read more on our
modal-invite-user.role-url: What can the users roles do?
modal-invite-user.user-rights-web: User must have access to web
modal-invite-user.user-rights-app: User must have access to app
modal-invite-user.user-rights-prices: User must have access to view prices

modal-create-location.title: Create new location
modal-create-location.description: New locations can be accessed immediately in the dropdown menu in the top right corner.
modal-create-location.create-more-users: Create more users to assign access rights when creating locations.
modal-create-location.own-user: Your own user will automatically get access to this location, hence why its not shown here.

modal-edit-user.title: Edit user
modal-edit-user.description: Here you can edit a user's name and access levels.
modal-edit-user.user-not-found-description: The user could not be found, please try again
modal-edit-user.create-more-locations: Create more locations to assign access rights when editing users.

validation.name_one: Name must be at least {{count}} character
validation.name_other: Name must be at least {{count}} characters
validation.locationIDs_one: At least {{count}} location must be selected
validation.locationIDs_other: At least {{count}} locations must be selected

modal-reset-userpin.title: Reset the users PIN
modal-reset-userpin.description: This action sends a mail to the user with a link to reset their PIN

inventory-report-modal.card-desc: Generate a report on inventory value for a location
inventory-report-modal.title: Inventory Value Report
inventory-report-modal.desc: Download a report with inventory value for a specific location.
inventory-report-modal.file-type-not-supported: The chosen file format is not supported

modal-delete-user.title: Delete user
modal-delete-user.description: This action is permanent and cannot be reversed

errors.delete-setting-failed: Email was not deleted. Try again

add-modal.title: Add new scheduled email
add-modal.type-error-message: At least one mail type is required
add-modal.email-external-mail: Sending to email not in your company or access level
add-modal.email-error-message: Email must belong to a user when 'Stock movements' type is selected

mail-types.stock-value-description: Sent at the end of the month
mail-types.reorder-description: Sent when items are ready for reorder
mail-types.movements-description: Send the user's stock movements daily

delete-modal.title: Delete scheduled email?
delete-modal.description: This action is permanent and cannot be reversed. Do you want to delete this scheduled email?

integrations.before-install-sub-1: Before you can get started, you need to install a data provider in NemLager
integrations.before-install-sub-2: At the moment, NemLager supports e-conomic.

e-conomic.sub-1: Before the two systems can talk to each other, you need to install our NemLager app in your e-conomic account.
e-conomic.sub-2-part-1: The app can be installed by following our
e-conomic.sub-2-part-2: and following e-conomics instructions. Only superusers can do this.
e-conomic.sub-3: After that, the ID shown on the screen must be saved in NemLager by copying it into the input field below. If you closed the e-conomic page, the ID can still be found in e-conomic by going to Alle indstillinger > Udvidelser > Apps i e-conomic.

integrations.providers-desc: Here you can see what data providers are installed in NemLager
integrations.integrations-desc: Here you can see what integrations are activated in NemLager

integrations.sync-products-desc: Update products in NemLager when updated in other systems

delete-modal.title: Uninstall {{provider}}
delete-modal.body: When you uninstall a data provider in NemLager, data is only removed from NemLager. You are responsible for disconnecting NemLager from the external system if you want to fully terminate the integration.

enable-sync-dialog.title: Enable product catalog synchronization
enable-sync-dialog.description: When you enable synchronization of your product catalog, only SkanCode can disable it again. Do you want to enable synchronization?

actions.cannot-sync-catalogue: Could not synchronize the product catalog

table.message_product-no-history-log: Product history log could not be created for product
